DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics AZD0328 healthy male volunteer . AZD0328 administer single oral dose ( capsule ) two treatment period , food intake fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Effect Food Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) AZD0328
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Caucasian subject . Clinically normal physical finding , laboratory value , vital sign rest ECG judge investigator . Signed informed consent form History clinically significant cardio cerebrovascular , pulmonary , renal , hepatic , neurological , mental gastrointestinal disorder ( include dyspepsia GERD ) major disorder may interfere study . Intake another investigational drug participation another study may interfere objective study , within 12 week administration investigational product .
